   • Core (Tranche C or retained gains): Strategic – 12 – 24 months.

   • Approval and launch of U.S. spot ETH ETF with sustained >$300 M average weekly inflows.

• Monitor ETH net-burn dashboard weekly and ETF news flow; cut exposure by half if either red-flags triggers.
